name: Leia's Sporting Blaster (V)
Lore: 'Defender sporting blaster, made by Drearian Defense Conglomerate. Intended for personal defense or small-game hunting. Short range. Low power. Carries energy for 50 shots.',
Text: 'Deploy on Leia or your non-droid Undercover spy. May target a character or creature for free. Draw destiny. Target lost if destiny > defense value. During opponent''s move phase, if on your Undercover spy, may ''break cover'' to fire.',
